documents.title: SAPA PHILATEX First Quarter 2026
documents.summary: First Quarter 2026 newsletter featuring new editor Jim Durham's introduction, Q1 meeting calendar with updated location at MacArthur Park Lutheran Church, USPS 2026 stamp preview, and updated Board of Governors listing.

documents.title: SAPA PHILATEX Fourth Quarter 2025
documents.summary: Features the October-December meeting calendar, year-end activities, holiday schedule adjustments, 2026 membership renewal information, upcoming stamp shows, and special programs on postal history and rare stamp collections.

documents.title: SAPA PHILATEX Third Quarter 2025
documents.summary: Features the July-September meeting calendar, annual "Blue Chip" auction details, Greater Houston Stamp Show information, TSDA show schedule, 2025 membership drive, and programs on US Air Mail History and Classic Mexican Stamps.

documents.title: SAPA PHILATEX Second Quarter 2025
documents.summary: Contains the April-June meeting schedule, club updates, member spotlights, and special features on recent philatelic discoveries and collecting tips for the spring season.

documents.title: The Early History of US Air Mail
documents.summary: An exploration of the pioneering days of US air mail service, including the brave pilots, early routes, and the stamps that commemorated these historic achievements.

documents.title: Classic Stamps of Mexico
documents.summary: An exploration of Mexico's classic stamp period, including the famous Hidalgo issues, printing varieties, and the historical context of early Mexican postal history.

documents.summary: Regular meeting cancelled due to Christmas holiday week. Wishing all members a wonderful holiday season and Happy New Year!

documents.title: Annual SAPA Summer Picnic
documents.summary: Join us for our annual summer picnic! Food, fellowship, and philatelic fun. Bring the family!

documents.title: Complete Beginner's Guide to Stamp Collecting
documents.summary: Everything you need to know to start your stamp collecting journey, from basic terminology to building your first collection.

documents.title: Understanding Stamp Grading and Condition
documents.summary: Learn how to properly assess stamp condition and understand grading standards used by collectors and dealers.

documents.title: Stamp Storage and Preservation Guide
documents.summary: Learn proper techniques for storing and preserving your stamp collection to maintain its condition and value over time.

documents.title: Philately
documents.summary: The collection and study of postage stamps and related postal items.

documents.title: Mint
documents.summary: A stamp that has never been used for postage and retains its original gum.

documents.title: Perforation
documents.summary: Small holes punched between stamps to make separation easier.

documents.title: Watermark
documents.summary: A design or pattern pressed into paper during manufacture, visible when held to light.

documents.title: First Day Cover
documents.summary: An envelope bearing a stamp cancelled on its first day of issue.
